description: Decode one or more strings encoded with base64. The input can be a single chunk of base64 or a list of strings separated by a delimiter.

inputs.description: Defaults to False. If True, use the delimiter to split the input string and decode each of the components separately if it is base64.
inputs.name: split_input

inputs.description: The character to use as a delimiter if split_input is True. Defaults to a comma. The special option "space" can be used to split on a single space character (" ").
inputs.name: delimiter

outputs.description: Resulting string after decoding from base64
